title: Pumpkin ratatouille
ingredients: ['1 tbsp olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '1 green pepper, seeded and diced', '500g pumpkin, peeled, seeded and diced', '1 courgette, diced', '4 tomatoes, diced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '1/4 tsp paprika', '1 tsp fresh rosemary or thyme or 1/4 tsp dried', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', 'sprigs of fresh rosemary or thyme to garnish']
